RAnnotated
 
RArray<X extends RPrimitive>
The RArrays are actually vectors with the logical dimensions specified seperately, and they can be re-dimensioned on the fly.
RAsync
Methods marked by this annotation will be included in the R library api.
RBlocking
Methods marked by this annotation will be included in the R library api.
RBoundDataframe<X>
A RBoundDataframe is a dataframe bound to an annotated POJO interface type.
RBoundDataframeRow<X>
RBoundDataframeRow class.
RCharacter
A wrapper for character classes in R.
RCharacterVector
A java representation of an R character vector.
RClass
 
RClass
This annotation identifies a class as part of an R library api Fields here will populate data in DESCRIPTION file and allow R to load dependencies when it loads the R library api
RCollection<X extends RObject>
Thing list R lists or named lists are collections in a loose sense of the term as they can be iterated over.
RConverter
Variety of static functions to facilitate data conversion from Java to R.
RConverter.CollectingConverter<X,Y>
The ConvertingCollector interface allows us to reuse stream collectors for other non stream data types by apply these to streams, iterators, arrays, collections, and iterables, as well as plain instances.
RConverter.VectorCollector<T,X extends RPrimitive,Y extends RVector<X>>
VectorCollectors can be used to collect a stream of java objects into an RVector with defined type.
RDataframe
A java equivalent of the R Dataframe organised in column format.
RDataframeRow
RDataframeRow class.
RDataType
This annotation identifies a class as a datatype in the R library api Fields here are R code used to handle conversion to and from R.
RDate
A java representation of the R base Date class (will also be used for POSIXt classes)
RDateVector
Java wrapper for R vector of dates.
RDefault
The RDefault annotation can be used to define R code that will be used if nothing is passed to the this method for the annotated value.
RFactor
A single value of a factor is largely the same as a String from most perspectives but has an associated index value.
RFactorVector
A Java wrapper for factors.
RFilter<X extends RPrimitive>
RFilter class.
RFinalize
The methods marked by this annotation will be called just prior to garbage collection and can be used to free up resources.
RFunctions
RFunctions class.
RFuture
A slightly idiosyncratic implementation of a Java Future API that can be called from generated R code.
RFuture.MethodRunnable
 
RInteger
The integer wrapper handles the translation of R integers to Java Integer.class while the value is passed through the JNI interface as an unboxed primitive int.
RIntegerVector
The vector of integers is needed to ensure that NA values are correctly handled and allow flexibility of a java List structure for easy manipulation.
RList
The R List is a flexible untyped list rather like a JSON document.
RLogical
The logical wrapper handles the translation of R logical to Java Boolean.class while the value is passed through the JNI interface as an unboxed primitive int.
RLogicalVector
The vector of logicals is needed to ensure that NA values are correctly handled and allow flexibility of a java List structure for easy manipulation.
RMethod
 
RMethod
Methods marked by this annotation will be included in the R library api.
RModel
 
RModelWriter
 
RName
The RName anotation marks getter fields for mapping POJO fields to named lists or dataframe columns.
RNamed<X extends RObject>
A named object.
RNamedList
The R named list is a flexible untyped map rather like a JSON document.
RNamedPrimitives
RNamedPrimitives class.
RNull
In general you won;t see this class.
RNumeric
The numeric wrapper handles the translation of R numerics to Java Double.class while the value is passed through the JNI interface as an unboxed primitive double.
RNumericArray
The vector of numerics is needed to ensure that NA values are correctly handled and allow flexibility of a java List structure for easy manipulation.
RNumericVector
The vector of numerics is needed to ensure that NA values are correctly handled and allow flexibility of a java List structure for easy manipulation.
RObject
RObject interface.
RObjectVisitor<X>
Visitor patterns for R object tree.
RObjectVisitor.Default
 
RObjectVisitor.DefaultOnceOnly<Y>
 
RObjectVisitor.DefaultOptional<Y>
Default visitor implemementation that returns an optional empty value for every visit.
RObjectVisitor.OnceOnly<Y>
This abstract visitor will visit each node once and collect the result into a traversal order list.
RPrimitive
RPrimitive interface.
RStreams
The Class Java8Streams can be statically imported and allows any type to be flatMapped.
RStreams.Exceptional<T>
 
RStreams.ExceptionalFunction<T,R>
 
RStreams.FilteredException
 
RStringr
RStringr class.
RType
This is used for parameters and for return types.
Rule<T>
Rule interface.
Rule.MapRule<Y>
The MapRule interface allows a label to be associated with a data mapping
Rule.StreamRule<Z,W>
The StreamRule interface allows a data mapping that selects another stream to be associated with and a set of named data mappings selecting end data items The intermediate stream is used to flatten a nested data structure, by firstly mapping a stream to a nested stream, them mapping that to a named set of data.
RUntypedNa
RUntypedNa class.
RUntypedNaVector
RUntypedNaVector class.

Abstract RVector class.
UnconvertableTypeException
This gets thrown when a datatype transformation cannot continue and it is likely a catchable condition
